actions.description: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down)
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level piercing damage
actions.name: Maul

languages: understands the languages its summoner speaks
name: Bestial Spirit

specialTraits.description: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach
specialTraits.name: Flyby (Air only)

specialTraits.description: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water only)

specialTraits.description: The beast can breathe only underwater
specialTraits.name: Water Breathing (Water only)
